Ok, I'd like to apologize if any of my posts were a bit weird today. I 
was.... Well, let
s just say I was not myself.... This doesn't happen too often, so don't 
worry. I'm ok now, though. If anyone really wants me to, I'll rewrite some of 
my posts.

::Rust::

Ruist's eyes widen as he hears Whistler's words. He didn't like bots 
adressing him like that, not at all.

"Now listen here, soldier!" he says loudly, rounding on the bot, "I'm the 
Major of this group, and you follow my orders! Now I say to watch that bot 
carefully, what's to say he's not lying through his teeth?"

Rust eyes Dinotron suspicioustly.
